tweet: On forfeiture reform, it's time for Congress to seize the moment and pass the FAIR Act. Read my op-ed with @RepRaskin in the @freep. https://www.freep.com/story/opinion/contributors/2019/05/30/federal-civil-asset-forfeiture-laws/1278197001/ …

It's time for a better trade deal than NAFTA. It's time to vote on USMCA. Read more from @RepPaulMitchell, @RepMoolenaar, @RepHuizenga, @RepJackBergman, and me in today's @detroitnews. ⬇️ https://www.detroitnews.com/story/opinion/2019/05/30/opinion-michigan-workers-need-better-trade-deal/1268915001/ …

It was a privilege to participate in today’s #MemorialDay ceremony in Eaton Rapids to honor those who gave everything for the cause of freedom. May the memories of our fallen heroes always live on in our hearts. pic.twitter.com/irwpIbM5fw
Throughout the weekend, communities come together to pay tribute to our nation's fallen heroes. It was a privilege to be in Grand Ledge today for its Memorial Day ceremony. pic.twitter.com/GJ9wNyGstR

Thank you to everyone who attended today’s coffee hour in Hudson and to @_SMCSI for hosting us. It was wonderful to have the opportunity to present a 50th anniversary pin to a local Vietnam veteran. pic.twitter.com/XpcKcQyqCQ
Stopped by Milan High School today to recognize the winners of C-SPAN's @StudentCam video competition. Congrats on a job well done! pic.twitter.com/U6FT0qy1aN

The new Welcome Center at the @VAAnnArbor will be a tremendous resource for veterans in our community. It was a privilege to attend today's ribbon cutting along with @RepDebDingell. pic.twitter.com/5Sf9ejhdcN

It was an honor to deliver the commencement address tonight for graduates of Jackson Preparatory & Early College (@jpecfalcons). I'm excited to see what these talented students will go on to accomplish. pic.twitter.com/W9EYdrAElV

Today the House passed bipartisan legislation to help more Americans save for and have peace of mind in their retirement years. Pleased it included my provision with @RepLBR. https://walberg.house.gov/media/press-releases/house-passes-retirement-security-legislation-walberg-provisions …
It was a pleasure to welcome students and parents from Monroe Catholic Elementary Schools to DC today. Great questions about civic engagement and the legislative process. pic.twitter.com/rkq8lpv2ZC

To meet workforce demands, we need to better align what's taught in the classroom with the skills employers are seeking. 

An innovative example is @AdrianCollege's partnership with Google, which I highlighted at today's @EdLaborGOP hearing. pic.twitter.com/q7Le06ATKl

100 years ago, the House passed the 19th Amendment guaranteeing women the constitutional right to vote. Today I’m wearing a yellow rose to commemorate this historic milestone and the women who fought to make it a reality. #WomensVote100 pic.twitter.com/YLmEXKgZgI

This morning, I joined with Haley Petrowski to speak at a student assembly at Dundee Middle School. Haley is an @AdrianCollege student who courageously shares her own personal experience dealing with cyberbullying in order to raise awareness about the issue. pic.twitter.com/BkzG09blVt

Congratulations to the class of 2019! It was great to be at @olivetcollege today to celebrate the graduates and present a congressional tribute in recognition of their 175th anniversary. pic.twitter.com/4GJ3xBM82F
During #NationalPoliceWeek, we honor the men and women of law enforcement who risk their lives each day to protect our communities. We are so grateful for the work they do. pic.twitter.com/Tdmz3S4IHR

We had an opportunity today to pass three bipartisan bills to tackle out-of-control prescription drugs costs. Instead, House Democrats are putting political point scoring over problem solving. pic.twitter.com/3WVkxCjytY
At yesterday's hearing with Chairman @AjitPaiFCC, I asked about the @FCC's work to improve broadband mapping and deployment in rural communities. pic.twitter.com/nNrJW213m0
Great discussion with @RepLBR at @TheHillEvents on the future of work and bipartisan ways to strengthen retirement security. #TheHillWorkforceInno pic.twitter.com/7QPkOxcy0x
Had a great time visiting with 8th graders from @hudson_schools today and answering questions about my work in Congress. pic.twitter.com/n5vimz6Uty
Pleasure to speak with @NATEsafety on the importance of developing a highly skilled, professional workforce to build our 21st century communications infrastructure. pic.twitter.com/VDNoOGJiQf
Had a great visit with local first responders yesterday to thank them for all they do to serve our communities in the 7th District. pic.twitter.com/Lyzk9vzGfY

Great turnout at today's Veterans Fair with @RepDebDingell at VFW Post 423 in Washtenaw County. Helping our nation's heroes is a bipartisan commitment we share. A special thank you to all the organizations who joined us and serve our vets each day. pic.twitter.com/UXJyNYqTXM
Wishing a Happy #MothersDay to all the moms in Michigan and beyond. We are so grateful for your love and the many sacrifices you make for our families. pic.twitter.com/pbxJFduEFG

On Monday, @RepDebDingell and I will be co-hosting a Veterans Fair in Washtenaw County to help veterans and their families access available resources. Details here ⬇ https://walberg.house.gov/about/events/washtenaw-county-veterans-fair-2019 …
